item.title: MRMCDCTF2019: Sitting duck
item.description: Solution to Sitting duck (very easy) from MRMCDCTF 2019 Sitting duck was by far the easiest challenge I have written for the MRMCD 2019 CTF. It was targeted mostly at total CTF newbies that had absolutely no previous experience with reversing challenges. The challenge gives you a binary file and the hint that it is solvable with very little experience. When executing the file, it asks us for the flag.
